name: Promotion
comment: A promotion is a benefit offered to customers to encourage them to increase their spending. It includes all the settings required for the triggering and the application of promotions:1. Promotion action (benefit) – The benefit granted through the promotion, and can include a discount, allowance, free services, and so on2. Qualification criterion - The population that is qualified to receive the promotion and the timeline when the promotion can be granted. In other words, which customers qualify for the promotion, upon which event, through which sales channels, and so on.3. Promotion settings - The expiration period, priority with other promotions, and so on.
vf short description: A promotion is a benefit offered to customers to encourage them to increase their spending. It includes all the settings required for the triggering and the application of promotions:1.

fields.name: PromotionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: PromotionKey
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies a promotion. Generated Key based on Promotion Id

fields.name: PromotionId
fields.comment: The ID of the promotion Promotion.id

fields.name: PromotionName
fields.comment: The localized name of the promotion Promotion.name

fields.name: PromotionDesc
fields.comment: The localized description of the promotion Promotion.description

fields.name: PromotionType
fields.comment: The type of the promotion Promotion.type

fields.name: PromotionStartDate
fields.comment: Promotion Validity Start Date Promotion.validFor.startDateTime

fields.name: PromotionEndDate
fields.comment: Promotion Validity End Date Promotion.validFor.endDateTime

fields.name: PriorityInd
fields.comment: The priority of the promotion Promotion.priority

fields.name: ApplicationPolicyInd
fields.comment: Defines the policy to apply the qualified promotion - can be manual or automatic Promotion.applyPolicy

fields.name: SelectionPolicyInd
fields.comment: Defines how to select the benefited offer in case there are more thanrequired by a promotion condition. The available values are - cheapest, mostExpsensive, byPurchaseDate. In case not defeines, the default is byPurchaseDate. Promotion.selectionPolicy

fields.name: CrossProductPromotionFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the promotion rule refers to cross-product logic. The value is calculated by the Promotion domain. Promotion.crossProduct

fields.name: RestrictionUpperLimitInd
fields.comment: The promotion restriction. Defines how many instances (upper limit) of the catalog promotion that can be applied. Promotion.restriction.upperLimit

fields.name: RestrictionLimitPolicyInd
fields.comment: Defines which promotions shall be accounted for the limit calculation. Accumulated - any promotion ever granted will be accounted for, and once the limit is reached additional promotions (of the same type) cannot be given. Concurrent - relevant only for promotions that discount on-going RC. Only promotions that are active in parallel are accounted for the limit calculation. Promotion.restriction.limitPolicy

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
